chunks.text_preview: Horizon Midsize Steel - Blue. Horizon is a tribute to Japan. Whenever you go to the shore, you can see the horizon line. So far away, the ocean always looks calm. Horizon Midsize was designed for thinner wrists, a slightly smaller and very elegant alternative.. Product. Horizon is a tribute to Japan

static_fields.name: Horizon Midsize Steel - Blue
static_fields.description: Horizon is a tribute to Japan. Whenever you go to the shore, you can see the horizon line. So far away, the ocean always looks calm. Horizon Midsize was designed for thinner wrists, a slightly smaller and very elegant alternative.
